title: About
text: This site will showcase all of my projects, learning objectives,think-pieces as well as goals regarding Data Science!

title: Inder Kheraâ€™s Website
text:
Introduction: I was born and raised in Vancouver and spent most of my childhood playing soccer. After finishing my ungrad in Economics at Simon Fraster University I worked for the last 3 years in the finance sector for a Vancouver based investment firm.
Although my career trajectory was going at a successful pace I always felt as if something was missing. Looking back after some self reflection I was able to realize I always enjoyed my Data Science courses the most while completeting my undergrad, and hoped to one day have a career in the field.
I can now proudly say I am aport of the 9th cohort of UBC MDS and taking the steps needed to make my goals come true!
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
